thread.title: Dems Gone Wild: Violent Protests Burn Down Parts of UC Berkley, Campus On Lockdown - Justin Holcomb
thread.title_full: Dems Gone Wild: Violent Protests Burn Down Parts of UC Berkley, Campus On Lockdown - Justin Holcomb

author: Justin Holcomb
title: Dems Gone Wild: Violent Protests Burn Down Parts of UC Berkley, Campus On Lockdown - Justin Holcomb
text:
The Senior Editor of Breitbart News, Milo Yiannopoulos, was set to give a speech at the University of California-Berkley Wednesday night until chaos erupted from left-wing rioters who refuse to allow inclusiveness on American campuses. 
Homemade explosive devices and weaponry were used to destroy the campus property. 
Protesters even blocked the streets and confined civilians in barriers.
